notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: C.S.J., N.E.Y., C.C.T., P.G., D.B., and L.F. contributed to the concept of the manuscript and development of conceptual model. C.S.J., N.E.Y., C.C.T., P.G., D.B., and L.F. contributed to the writing of the manuscript. C.S.J., N.E.Y., and C.C.T. ran simulations and created figures.
